title: Cosmopolitan Johannesburg Escape with Outdoor Swimming Pool
description: Embrace the vibrant heart of South Africa when you stay at the cosmopolitan Holiday Inn Sandton - Rivonia Road, an IHG Hotel. Spend days swimming leisurely laps in the outdoor swimming pool, work out at the mini gym on the hotel's ninth floor with views of the Sandton Skyline, and enjoy South African wines and fresh a la carte dining at the onsite restaurant, Lettuce & Lime. On cooler nights, enjoy the warmth from the lobby's 10-metre-long fireplace.
location_description: Holiday Inn Sandton - Rivonia Road, an IHG Hotel
